name: The Messenger (itch) (Mivioon)
description:
Feel abandoned on an icy wasteland.Try to survive and deliver as many minerals as possible, buy in full in the store, and die a lot :). Also explore the world, can you find the boss? Free yourself from slavery!

Control: 

Walk - WASD 

Open Inventory - E (Hold)

 Shoot - Left Mouse Button (LMB)
